result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.eng: It was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ga: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.orig: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.html: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir gur ẛáraiġ siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.

result.eng: The court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ga: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.orig: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.html: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreachtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ponchtml: Ċinn an ċúirt gur ẛáraiġ an t-aċt an bunreaċtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.

result.eng: They accused of having lied.
result.ga: Chuir siad i mo leith gur inis mé bréaga
result.orig: Chuir siad i mo leith gur inis mé bréaga
result.html: Chuir siad i mo leith gur inis mé bréagaThey accused of having lied.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad i mo leiṫ gur inis mé bréagaThey accused of having lied.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: We can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ga: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.orig: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.html: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ponchtml: Is léir ó na rianta a d'ḟág siad ina ndiaiḋ gur beirt a ḃí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.

result.eng: I didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé an ríoṁṗost tar éis gur ċláraiġ méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.

result.eng: I am happy that I succeeded.
result.ga: Tá áthas orm gur éirigh liom
result.orig: Tá áthas orm gur éirigh liom
result.html: Tá áthas orm gur éirigh liomI am happy that I succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Tá áṫas orm gur éiriġ liomI am happy that I succeeded.

result.eng: I know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.html: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam gur ag a dó a ċlog atá m'agallaṁ ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.

result.eng: I thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ga: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.orig: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.html: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap mé gur ẛeafóideaċ an ṁaise dúinn a ḃeiṫ ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: It was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ga: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.orig: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.html: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ iontas ar biṫ dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.

result.eng: I remember that she added a lot to the course.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom gur chuir sí go mór leis an chúrsa
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom gur chuir sí go mór leis an chúrsa
result.html: Is cuimhin liom gur chuir sí go mór leis an chúrsaI remember that she added a lot to the course.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom gur ċuir sí go mór leis an ċúrsaI remember that she added a lot to the course.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.orig: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.html: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ponchtml: Is beag duine ar doṁan gur cuiṁin leis lá an ḋúnṁaraiṫe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: Agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: Reports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ga: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.orig: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.html: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ tuairiscí ag teaċt as Waẛington gur buaileaḋ an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.

result.eng: It wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ feaċtais in aġaiḋ na scláḃaíoċtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.

result.eng: I drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ga: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.orig: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.html: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ponchtml: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur ċaill mé mo ṁeaḃair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis gur ċeart dó glór a ċinn a aiṫneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
